metadata.Description: Well organized and easy to understand Web building tutorials with lots of examples of how to use HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL, PHP, Python, Bootstrap, Java and XML.
metadata.og:description: W3Schools offers free online tutorials, references and exercises in all the major languages of the web. Covering popular subjects like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, SQL, Java, and many, many more.

content.text: The uptime command is used to find out how long the system has been running.
content.html: The uptime command is used to find out how long the system has been running.

content.text: It provides a quick overview of the system's performance, including:
content.html: It provides a quick overview of the system's performance, including:

content.text: The basic syntax of the uptime command is:
content.html: The basic syntax of the uptime command is:

content.text: This command displays information like the current time, uptime duration, number of users, and load averages.
content.html: This command displays information like the current time, uptime duration, number of users, and load averages.

content.text: The output of the uptime command shows information like:
content.html: The output of the uptime command shows information like:

content.text: Here's an example of the uptime command output:
content.html: Here's an example of the uptime command output:

content.code:
uptime

14:36:01 up 10 days,  3:45,  4 users,  load average: 0.75, 0.60, 0.50
content.code_html:
uptime
 14:36:01 up 10 days,  3:45,  4 users,  load average: 0.75, 0.60, 0.50

content.text: The load averages provide a snapshot of the system's workload:
content.html: The load averages provide a snapshot of the system's workload:

content.code_html: load average: 0.75, 0.60, 0.50

content.text: In this example, the system load is decreasing over time, indicating that the system is becoming less busy.
content.html: In this example, the system load is decreasing over time, indicating that the system is becoming less busy.
